spec_data.Name: python2-pecan-notario
spec_data.Description:
Notario is flexible and succinct Python dictionary validator with the ability
to validate against both keys and values. Schemas are smaller and readable
representations of data being validated.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 23 Feb 2017 10:25:19 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: JSON validation for Pecan with Notario
